org.firebirdsql.fbjava

Interface ValuesMetadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ParameterMetaData, Wrapper

    public interface ValuesMetadata
extends ParameterMetaData
    This interface represents a Firebird Values (set of input/output parameters or trigger's old/new fields) metadata.
    Author:
    Adriano dos Santos Fernandes

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface java.sql.ParameterMetaData

        parameterModeIn, parameterModeInOut, parameterModeOut, parameterModeUnknown, parameterNoNulls, parameterNullable, parameterNullableUnknown

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getIndex(String name)
      Gets the index for a given name.
      Class<?> getJavaClass(int index)
      Gets the Java Class for a given value index.
      String getName(int index)
      Gets the name for a given value index.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.sql.ParameterMetaData

        getParameterClassName, getParameterCount, getParameterMode, getParameterType, getParameterTypeName, getPrecision, getScale, isNullable, isSigned

      • Methods inherited from interface java.sql.Wrapper

        isWrapperFor, unwrap

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        int getIndex(String name)
        Gets the index for a given name. Returns -1 if the name is not found.

      • getName

        String getName(int index)
        Gets the name for a given value index. Index starts from 1. Returns null in function output metadata.

      • getJavaClass

        Class<?> getJavaClass(int index)
        Gets the Java Class for a given value index. Index starts from 1.
